root.name: 101 Dalmatians: Escape From DeVil Manor
root.description: Overview101 Dalmatians: Escape From DeVil Manor is an action/adventure game developed by DreamForge and published by Disney Interactive for the PC platform.Recommended System RequirementsOperating System: Windows 3.1/95/98/ME/XP or MS-DOS 7.0,Optical Drive: 4X CD-ROM or FloppyOther: DirectX 3.0
